  • |Thymeleaf
  • |Thead attributes
  • Latest release: 0.9.0

<thead> attributes

Usage

The <thead> attributes allow you to configure both plugins (Scroller, FixedHeader, ...) and export. 

<table id="myTable" dt:table="true" dt:export="csv">
   <thead dt:csv:class="'btn'" dt:csv:label="'Custom label'">
      <tr>
         <th>Id</th>
         <th>Firstname</th>
         <th>Lastname</th>
         <th>City</th>
         <th>Mail</th>
      </tr>
   </thead>
   <tbody>
      <tr th:each="person : ${persons}">
         <td th:text="${person.id}">1</td>
         <td th:text="${person.firstName}">John</td>
         <td th:text="${person.lastName}">Doe</td>
         <td th:text="${person.address.town.name}">Nobody knows!</td>
         <td><a th:href="${'mailto:' + person.mail}" th:text="${person.mail}">john@doe.com</a></td>
      </tr>
   </tbody>
</table>

Reference

Name Description Value(s) Default value Data source compatibility
dt:scroller Enable or disable the DataTables Scroller plugin true|false false DOM AJAX
dt:colreorder Enable or disable the DataTables ColReorder plugin true|false false DOM AJAX
dt:fixedheader Enable or disable the DataTables FixedHeader plugin true|false false DOM AJAX
dt:csv:style CSS style applied on the CSV export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xml:style CSS style applied on the XML export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:pdf:style CSS style applied on the PDF export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xls:style CSS style applied on the XLS export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:style CSS style applied on the XLSX export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:csv:class CSS class applied on the CSV export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xml:class CSS class applied on the XML export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:pdf:class CSS class applied on the PDF export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xls:class CSS class applied on the XLS export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:class CSS class applied on the XLSX export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:csv:label Label of the CSV export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xml:label Label of the XML export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:pdf:label Label of the PDF export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xls:label Label of the XLS export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:label Label of the XLSX export link(s) DOM AJAX
dt:csv:filename Name of the generated CSV file containing exported data The export type uppercased DOM AJAX
dt:xml:filename Name of the generated XML file containing exported data The export type uppercased DOM AJAX
dt:pdf:filename Name of the generated PDF file containing exported data The export type uppercased DOM AJAX
dt:xls:filename Name of the generated XLX file containing exported data The export type uppercased DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:filename Name of the generated XLSX file containing exported data The export type uppercased DOM AJAX
dt:xls:autosize Indicates whether columns should be auto-sized or not (in XLS export file) (See the reference) true|false false DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:autosize Indicates whether columns should be auto-sized or not (in XLSX export file) (See the reference) true|false false DOM AJAX
dt:csv:header Indicates whether headers should be added in the CSV export file or not true|false true DOM AJAX
dt:xml:header Indicates whether headers should be added in the XML export file or not true|false true DOM AJAX
dt:pdf:header Indicates whether headers should be added in the PDF export file or not true|false true DOM AJAX
dt:xls:header Indicates whether headers should be added in the XLS export file or not true|false true DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:header Indicates whether headers should be added in the XLSX export file or not true|false true DOM AJAX
dt:csv:url URL that will be called to export in the CSV format DOM AJAX
dt:xml:url URL that will be called to export in the CSV format DOM AJAX
dt:xls:url URL that will be called to export in the CSV format DOM AJAX
dt:xlsx:url URL that will be called to export in the CSV format DOM AJAX
dt:pdf:url URL that will be called to export in the CSV format DOM AJAX
dt:csv:method HTTP method used to call the CSV export URL.
Warning! all methods are not supported by all browsers		 GET /
POST /
PUT /
DELETE		 GET DOM AJAX
